skyc/skysim.c File Reference

Contains the skysim() function that does the skycoverage simulation. More...


Defines

Functions

static dmat * calc_rmsol (dmat *mideal, const PARMS_S *parms)
 Compute Open loop NGS mode wavefront error from mode vectors.
static void skysim_isky (SIM_S *simu)
 The actual work horse that does the physical optics time domain simulation.
void skysim (const PARMS_S *parms)
 Setup the stars fields and then calls skysim_isky() to handle each star field.

Detailed Description

Contains the skysim() function that does the skycoverage simulation.

The steps: ) Read in parameters ) Read in necessary struct saved by MAOS and/or prepared by user ) Read in star catalog. ) Read in Focus tracking error as a function of sampling frequency ) Read in NGS Mode time vector ) For each possible asterism in a star field. #) Compute NGS Gradient operator from NGS modes. #) Read in saved PSF and interpolate to the location of NGS. apply extra strehl degradation. #) Compute NGS signal level and measurement error from matched filter (be careful about PSF quality). #) For each sample frequency. $) Compute the reconstructor $) Optimize for the loop gain. $) Estimate residual windshake error. $) Do a rough open loop estimate of the total error. (atm + windshake +focus tracking ...) $) Guess for the best sampling frequency (compare with closed loop results to validate this model). ) Compare the asterisms and pick only a few that are within ~200% of the best asterism at their best sampling freq. ) For each remaining asterism in the star field. #) Do a temporal simulation to obtain the final result. #) save error due to focus tracking, telescope windshake, separately. #) Find the best sampling frequency. ) Find the best asterism. ) Repeat for another star field.

Don't forget:

) Sampling frequency dependent rne. input a precomputed matrix for all possible sampling frequencies. ) Implementation error. ) Windshake (handle separately), focus tracking jitter ) On axis performance.

2010-06-16: Single asterism debugged. 2010-06-21: Bug found: wfs.thetax, thetay not copied from star. differences: MATLAB starts with a guess using QC model for NEA when regenerating pistat maos starts with loaded pistat. This is 1 difference. The gains are not sensitive to which PSD is loaded, or whether PSD is scaled or not.

Function Documentation

static dmat* calc_rmsol ( dmat *  mideal,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
) [static]

Compute Open loop NGS mode wavefront error from mode vectors. 

00082                                                            {
00083     double rms=0, rmstt=0;
00084     PDMAT(mideal, pmideal);
00085     for(long istep=0; istep<mideal->ny; istep++){
00086     rms+=dwdot(pmideal[istep], parms->maos.mcc, pmideal[istep]);
00087     rmstt+=dwdot2(pmideal[istep],parms->maos.mcc_tt,pmideal[istep]);
00088     }
00089     dmat *rmsol=dnew(2,1);
00090     rmsol->p[0]=rms/mideal->ny;
00091     rmsol->p[1]=rmstt/mideal->ny;
00092     return rmsol;
00093 }

static void skysim_isky ( SIM_S *  simu  )  [static]

The actual work horse that does the physical optics time domain simulation. 

00098                                     {
00099     int isky;
00100     POWFS_S *powfs=simu->powfs;
00101     const PARMS_S *parms=simu->parms;
00102     const dcell *stars=simu->stars;
00103     const int noisy=parms->skyc.noisy;
00104     const int do_demote_end=parms->skyc.demote?2:1;
00105     int nstar;
00106     int nstep;
00107     const int seed_skyc=simu->seed_skyc;
00108     const int seed_maos=simu->seed_maos;
00109 
00110     PDMAT(simu->res, pres);
00111     PDMAT(simu->res_oa, pres_oa);
00112     PDMAT(simu->res_ol, pres_ol);
00113     while(LOCK(simu->mutex_isky),isky=simu->isky++,
00114       UNLOCK(simu->mutex_isky),isky<simu->isky_end){
00115     double tk_1=myclockd();
00116     //Setup star parameters.
00117     STAR_S *star=setup_star(&nstar, simu,stars->p[isky],seed_maos);
00118     if(!star){
00119         info2("Field %d, No stars available\n", isky);
00120         continue;
00121     }
00122     int naster;
00123     ASTER_S *aster=setup_aster_comb(&naster, nstar, parms);
00124     if(!aster || aster==0){
00125         info2("Field %d, Aster is empty. skip\n", isky);
00126         continue;
00127     }
00128     TIC;tic;
00129     for(int iaster=0; iaster<naster; iaster++){
00130         //Parallelizing over aster gives same random stream.
00131         seed_rand(&aster[iaster].rand, seed_skyc+iaster+40);
00132         //Compute signal level.
00133         setup_aster_copystar(&aster[iaster], star, parms);
00134         //setup gradient operator.
00135         setup_aster_g(&aster[iaster], star, powfs, parms);
00136         //Compute the reconstructor, nea, sigman
00137         setup_aster_recon(&aster[iaster], star,parms);
00138         //Optimize servo gains.
00139         setup_aster_servo(simu, &aster[iaster], parms);
00140     }
00141     if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00142         toc2("Estimation");
00143     }
00144     //Select asters that have good performance.
00145     setup_aster_select(pres_ol[isky],aster, naster, star, 
00146                simu->rmsol->p[0]/9,parms); 
00147     //Read in physical optics data (wvf)
00148     nstep=setup_star_read_wvf(star,nstar,parms,seed_maos);
00149     //Physical Optics Simulations.
00150 
00151     double skymini=INFINITY;
00152     int selaster=0;
00153     int seldtrat=0;
00154     for(int iaster=0; iaster<naster; iaster++){
00155         ASTER_S *asteri=&aster[iaster];
00156         asteri->nstep=nstep;
00157         if(!asteri->use || (parms->skyc.dbgaster>-1 && iaster!=parms->skyc.dbgaster)){
00158         continue;
00159         }
00160         if(parms->skyc.verbose>1){
00161         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster[iaster].nwfs; iwfs++){
00162             info2("wfs %d: istar=%d, ipowfs=%d\n",iwfs,aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].istar,
00163               aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].ipowfs);
00164             info2("wfs %d: at (%g,%g). siglev=%g\n",iwfs,
00165               aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].thetax*206265,
00166               aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].thetay*206265, aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].siglevtot);
00167         }
00168         }
00169         if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00170         info2("Aster %d, Estimated minimum error is %.2fnm at %.1f Hz\n", iaster,
00171               sqrt(asteri->mresol)*1e9, parms->skyc.fss[asteri->mdtrat]);
00172         }
00173         //Copy wvf from star to aster
00174         setup_aster_wvf(asteri, star, parms);
00175         //Regenerate PSD for this combination only.
00176         setup_aster_regenpsf(simu->mideal, asteri,powfs,parms);
00177         //Redo matched filter.
00178         setup_aster_redomtch(asteri, powfs, parms);
00179         //Compute the reconstructor, nea, sigman
00180         setup_aster_recon(asteri, star, parms);
00181         //Optimize servo gains.
00182         setup_aster_servo(simu, asteri, parms);
00183 
00184         double mini=INFINITY;
00185         dmat *pmini=NULL;
00186         dmat *min_imres=NULL;
00187         int mdtrat=0;
00188         int demote=-1;
00189         for(int idtrat=aster->idtratmin; idtrat<=aster->idtratmax; idtrat++){
00190         //focus and windshake residual;
00191         double resadd=asteri->res_ws->p[idtrat] + parms->skyc.resfocus->p[idtrat];
00192         dmat *ires=NULL;
00193         dmat *imres=NULL;
00194         for(int do_demote=0; do_demote<do_demote_end; do_demote++){
00195             ires=skysim_phy(&imres,simu, asteri, powfs, parms, idtrat, noisy, do_demote);
00196             if(ires){
00197             if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00198                 if(do_demote){
00199                 info2("  DemoteTTF: ");
00200                 }
00201                 info2("%5.1f Hz %7.2f +%7.2f =%7.2f", parms->skyc.fss[idtrat], 
00202                   sqrt(ires->p[0])*1e9, sqrt(resadd)*1e9,
00203                   sqrt(ires->p[0]+resadd)*1e9);
00204             }
00205             //Add windshake contribution.
00206             double tot_1=ires->p[0] + resadd;
00207             if(tot_1 < mini){
00208                 mini=tot_1;
00209                 mdtrat=idtrat;
00210                 demote=do_demote;
00211                 dfree(pmini); pmini=dref(ires);
00212                 dfree(min_imres); min_imres=dref(imres);
00213             }
00214             }
00215         }
00216         if(ires && parms->skyc.verbose){
00217             info2("\n");
00218         }
00219         dfree(ires);
00220         dfree(imres);
00221         }
00222         if(mini<skymini){
00223         selaster=iaster;
00224         skymini=mini;
00225         //Field Averaged Performance.
00226         pres[isky][1]=pmini->p[0];
00227         pres[isky][2]=pmini->p[1];
00228         pres[isky][3]=asteri->res_ws->p[mdtrat];
00229         pres[isky][4]=parms->skyc.resfocus->p[mdtrat];
00230         pres[isky][0]=pres[isky][1]+pres[isky][3]+pres[isky][4];
00231         //On axis performance.
00232         pres_oa[isky][1]=pmini->p[2];
00233         pres_oa[isky][2]=pmini->p[3];
00234         pres_oa[isky][3]=asteri->res_ws->p[mdtrat];
00235         pres_oa[isky][4]=parms->skyc.resfocus->p[mdtrat];
00236         pres_oa[isky][0]=pres_oa[isky][1]+pres_oa[isky][3]+pres_oa[isky][4];
00237         seldtrat = mdtrat;
00238         simu->fss->p[isky]=parms->skyc.fss[mdtrat];
00239         simu->demote->p[isky]=demote;
00240         if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00241             info2("%5.1f Hz: Update Tot: %6.2f nm NGS: %6.2f nm TT: %6.2f nm\n", 
00242               simu->fss->p[isky],
00243               sqrt(pres[isky][0])*1e9, sqrt(pres[isky][1])*1e9, sqrt(pres[isky][2])*1e9);
00244         }
00245         dcp(&simu->mres->p[isky], min_imres);
00246         }
00247         dfree(pmini);
00248         dfree(min_imres);
00249     }//iaster
00250 
00251     PDMAT(simu->sel->p[isky],psel);
00252     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster[selaster].nwfs; iwfs++){
00253         psel[iwfs][0]=aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].thetax;
00254         psel[iwfs][1]=aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].thetay;
00255         for(int iwvl=0; iwvl<parms->maos.nwvl; iwvl++){
00256         psel[iwfs][iwvl+2]=aster[selaster].wfs[iwfs].mags->p[iwvl];
00257         }
00258     }
00259     if(parms->skyc.save){
00260         skysim_save(simu, aster, pres[isky], selaster, seldtrat, isky);
00261     }
00262     free_aster(aster, naster, parms);
00263     free_star(star, nstar, parms);
00264     double tk_2=myclockd();
00265     LOCK(simu->mutex_save);
00266     simu->status->isim=isky;
00267     simu->status->tot=tk_2-tk_1;//per step
00268     simu->status->laps=tk_2-simu->tk_0;
00269     int nsky_seed=simu->isky_end-simu->isky_start;
00270     int nseed_tot=parms->maos.nseed*parms->skyc.nseed;
00271     int nsky_left=simu->isky_end-simu->isky-1+nsky_seed*(nseed_tot-simu->iseed-1);
00272     int nsky_laps=simu->isky-simu->isky_start+1+nsky_seed*simu->iseed;
00273     simu->status->rest=simu->status->laps*nsky_left/nsky_laps;
00274     simu->status->clerrlo=sqrt(pres[isky][1])*1e9;
00275     simu->status->clerrhi=sqrt(pres[isky][0])*1e9;
00276     scheduler_report(simu->status);
00277     UNLOCK(simu->mutex_save);
00278     long totm=(long)floor(simu->status->tot/60.);
00279     long tots=(long)simu->status->tot-totm*60;
00280     long laps_h=simu->status->laps/3600;
00281     long laps_m=simu->status->laps/60-laps_h*60;
00282     long rest_h=simu->status->rest/3600;
00283     long rest_m=simu->status->rest/60-rest_h*60;
00284     info2("Field %d, %2d stars, %5.1f Hz: Final Tot: %6.2f nm NGS: %6.2f nm TT: %6.2f nm"
00285           "Tot %ld:%2ld. Used %ld:%2ld, Left %ld:%2ld\n",
00286           isky, nstar, simu->fss->p[isky],
00287           sqrt(pres[isky][0])*1e9, sqrt(pres[isky][1])*1e9, sqrt(pres[isky][2])*1e9,
00288           totm, tots, laps_h, laps_m, rest_h, rest_m);
00289     }//while
00290 }

void skysim ( const PARMS_S *  parms  ) 

Setup the stars fields and then calls skysim_isky() to handle each star field. 

00294                                  {
00295     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00296     dwrite(parms->skyc.resfocus, "%s/resfocus",dirsetup);
00297     }
00298     const int npowfs=parms->maos.npowfs;
00299     SIM_S *simu=calloc(1, sizeof(SIM_S));
00300     simu->status=calloc(1, sizeof(STATUS_T));
00301     simu->status->info=S_RUNNING;
00302     simu->status->scale=1;
00303     simu->status->nseed=parms->maos.nseed*parms->skyc.nseed;
00304     simu->status->nthread=parms->skyc.nthread;
00305     simu->status->timstart=myclocki();
00306     simu->powfs=calloc(npowfs, sizeof(POWFS_S));
00307     simu->parms=parms;
00308     setup_powfs(simu->powfs, parms);
00309     genpistat(parms, simu->powfs); 
00310     PINIT(simu->mutex_isky);
00311     PINIT(simu->mutex_save);
00312     simu->tk_0=myclockd();
00313     for(int iseed_maos=0; iseed_maos<parms->maos.nseed; iseed_maos++){
00314     simu->seed_maos=parms->maos.seeds[iseed_maos];//loop over seed
00315     //Read ideal NGS mode.
00316     simu->mideal=dread("%s_%d.bin",parms->maos.fnmideal,simu->seed_maos);
00317     //Read ideal NGS mode dot product for on axis.
00318     dcell *midealp=dcellread("%s_%d.bin",parms->maos.fnmidealp,simu->seed_maos);
00319     simu->mideal_oa=dref(midealp->p[parms->maos.evlindoa]);
00320     dcellfree(midealp);
00321     simu->rmsol=calc_rmsol(simu->mideal, parms);
00322     simu->psd_ws=ddup(parms->skyc.psd_ws);
00323     simu->psd_ngs=ddup(parms->skyc.psd_ngs);
00324     simu->psd_ps=ddup(parms->skyc.psd_ps);
00325     simu->psd_tt=ddup(parms->skyc.psd_tt);
00326     prep_bspstrehl(simu);
00327     //renormalize PSD
00328     if(parms->skyc.psd_scale){
00329         double rms_ngs=psd_intelog2(simu->psd_ngs);
00330         info("PSD integrates to %.2f nm\n", sqrt(rms_ngs)*1e9);
00331         double rms_ratio=simu->rmsol->p[0]/rms_ngs;
00332         info("Scaling PSD by %g\n", rms_ratio);
00333         long nx=simu->psd_ngs->nx;
00334         //scale PSF in place.
00335         double *p_ngs=simu->psd_ngs->p+nx;
00336         double *p_tt=simu->psd_tt->p+nx;
00337         double *p_ps=simu->psd_ps->p+nx;
00338         for(long i=0; i<nx; i++){
00339         p_ngs[i]*=rms_ratio;
00340         p_tt[i]*=rms_ratio;
00341         p_ps[i]*=rms_ratio;
00342         }
00343         rms_ngs=psd_intelog2(simu->psd_ngs);
00344         info("PSD integrates to %.2f nm after scaling\n", sqrt(rms_ngs)*1e9);
00345     }
00346     simu->psd_ngs_ws=add_psd(simu->psd_ngs, simu->psd_ws);
00347     simu->psd_tt_ws=add_psd(simu->psd_tt, simu->psd_ws);
00348     for(int iseed_skyc=0; iseed_skyc<parms->skyc.nseed; iseed_skyc++){
00349         simu->status->iseed=iseed_skyc+iseed_maos*parms->skyc.nseed;
00350         simu->seed_skyc=parms->skyc.seeds[iseed_skyc];
00351         seed_rand(&simu->rand, simu->seed_skyc+parms->maos.zadeg);
00352       
00353 
00354         info2("Open loop error: NGS: %.2f TT: %.2f nm\n", 
00355           sqrt(simu->rmsol->p[0])*1e9, sqrt(simu->rmsol->p[1])*1e9);
00356        
00357 
00358         //generate star fields.
00359         if(parms->skyc.stars){
00360         info2("Loading stars from %s\n",parms->skyc.stars);
00361         simu->stars=dcellread("%s",parms->skyc.stars);
00362         sortstars(simu->stars);
00363         }else{
00364         simu->stars=genstars(parms->skyc.nsky, 
00365                      parms->skyc.lat, parms->skyc.lon,parms->skyc.catscl,
00366                      parms->skyc.patfov,parms->maos.nwvl, 
00367                      parms->maos.wvl, &simu->rand);
00368         }
00369         dcellwrite(simu->stars, "Res%d_%d_stars",simu->seed_maos,simu->seed_skyc);
00370         int nsky=simu->stars->nx*simu->stars->ny;
00371         if(nsky > parms->skyc.nsky){
00372         warning("nsky is reduced from %d to %d\n", 
00373             nsky, parms->skyc.nsky);
00374         nsky=parms->skyc.nsky;
00375         }
00376         int seed_maos=simu->seed_maos;
00377         int seed_skyc=simu->seed_skyc;
00378         simu->res   =dnew_mmap(5,nsky, "Res%d_%d", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00379         simu->res_oa=dnew_mmap(5,nsky, "Res%d_%d_oa", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00380         simu->res_ol=dnew_mmap(3,nsky, "Res%d_%d_ol", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00381         simu->fss   =dnew_mmap(nsky,1, "Res%d_%d_fss", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00382         simu->demote=dnew_mmap(nsky,1, "Res%d_%d_demote", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00383         simu->sel   =dcellnewsame_mmap(nsky, 1, 2+parms->maos.nwvl, parms->skyc.nwfstot,
00384                        "Res%d_%d_sel", seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00385         simu->mres  =dcellnewsame_mmap(nsky, 1, parms->maos.nmod, parms->maos.nstep,
00386                        "Res%d_%d_mres",  seed_maos, seed_skyc);
00387         dset(simu->res, simu->rmsol->p[0]);
00388         dset(simu->res_oa, simu->rmsol->p[0]);
00389         simu->isky_start=parms->skyc.start;
00390         simu->isky_end=nsky;
00391         if(parms->skyc.dbgsky>-1){
00392         simu->isky_start=parms->skyc.dbgsky;
00393         simu->isky_end=parms->skyc.dbgsky+1;
00394         }
00395         simu->status->simstart=simu->isky_start;
00396         simu->status->simend=simu->isky_end;
00397         if(simu->isky_start >= simu->isky_end){
00398         continue;//nothing to do.
00399         }
00400         simu->isky=simu->isky_start;
00401         CALL(skysim_isky, simu, parms->skyc.nthread);//isky iteration.
00402         dcellfree(simu->stars);
00403         dfree(simu->res);
00404         dfree(simu->res_oa);
00405         dfree(simu->res_ol);
00406         dcellfree(simu->mres);
00407         dcellfree(simu->sel);
00408         dfree(simu->fss);
00409         simu->iseed++;
00410     }//iseed_skyc
00411     dfree(simu->mideal);
00412     dfree(simu->mideal_oa);
00413     dfree(simu->rmsol);
00414     dfree(simu->psd_ws);
00415     dfree(simu->psd_ngs);
00416     dfree(simu->psd_ps);
00417     dfree(simu->psd_ws);
00418     dfree(simu->psd_tt_ws);
00419     dfree(simu->psd_ngs_ws);
00420     //Free the data used to do bicubic spline.
00421     for(int ipowfs=0; ipowfs<parms->maos.npowfs; ipowfs++){
00422         for(int ic=0; ic<parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs]*parms->maos.nwvl; ic++){
00423         dcellfree(simu->bspstrehl[ipowfs][ic]);
00424         }
00425         free(simu->bspstrehl[ipowfs]);
00426     }
00427     free(simu->bspstrehl);
00428     dfree(simu->bspstrehlxy);
00429     }//iseed_maos
00430     free(simu->status);
00431     free_powfs(simu->powfs,parms);
00432     free(simu->powfs);
00433     free(simu);
00434 }
